titles.title: Commending the University of Oklahoma's gymnastics team for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Gymnastics Championship.
Commending the University of Oklahoma's gymnastics team for winning the 2005 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Gymnastics Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

bill.summary: Commends the University of Oklahoma Sooners for their third National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Gymnastics Championship in the last four years.
